title: The New Server Islands of Astro and What They Are
image_alt: Image of the new Astro Server Islands
summary: Astro has launched a new feature called Server Islands that promises to revolutionize the way websites are built. Discover what they are and how they work.
content:
If you already know Astro, you'll know that it's a modern framework for building websites, designed to be fast, simple, and scalable. One of the most outstanding features of Astro are the "islands", a technology that it has popularized, allowing pages to be surprisingly fast thanks to their limited interactivity to certain areas. However, these traditional "islands" had a drawback: they loaded on the client. This worked well for static sites without a backend, such as blogs or portfolio pages, but it became complicated for sites that required dynamic backend content, such as e-commerce. This is where Server Islands become an ingenious solution, maintaining the same concept of traditional "islands" but with the ability to process code from the backend.
## How do they work and when can I use them? Source: Astro Server Islands can process backend code on the server side. The great thing is that you can have multiple islands without having to wait for them to load for the content to render. Astro takes care of rendering them on the server and sending them to the client. It's important to note that Server Islands are very useful for dynamic content that doesn't change frequently. For example, they may not be the best option for content that is constantly updated, such as a social network. Currently, this feature is in beta, but you can try it experimentally in the Astro 4.12 version, which has not yet been officially released.

## How similar are Astro's Server Islands to Next.js's PPR? Source: Luna News Astro's Server Islands are similar to Next.js's PPR (Partial Pre-rendering), as both technologies allow content to be rendered on the server and sent to the client. However, Astro's Server Islands are easier to implement and, in some benchmarks, have been shown to be faster than Next.js's PPR.
conclusion: ## Conclusion Astro's Server Islands are a very interesting feature that promises to revolutionize the way websites are built. They allow you to have a backend on a static site without sacrificing the speed and simplicity of Astro. Although this feature is still in experimental mode, it is something to keep in mind for the future of Astro and the creation of modern and fast websites.

title: Mac mini with M4: Closer Than You Think?
summary: The Mac mini with M4 could be a reality sooner than you think. Find out why Apple might be skipping the M3 and what to expect from this new version.
content:
The Mac mini is a compact and versatile desktop computer that has been popular with Apple users for years, thanks to its minimalist design and good value for money, something uncommon in the Apple world. The incorporation of an M4 Chip in the Mac mini would represent an attractive option for those looking for improved performance and greater energy efficiency. With the M4 chip, Apple could offer a faster and smoother user experience, in addition to longer battery life.
## Why is there no Mac mini with M3? It has been two years since the launch of the Mac mini with M2, and users have been eagerly awaiting an update. Although the Mac Mini with the M2 is still a solid option for many, the possibility of a Mac mini with an M3 chip seems increasingly distant. Instead, Apple's M4 chips are already a reality, suggesting that Apple may be skipping the M3 processor generation for some computers, especially the Mac mini.

## What to Expect from a Mac mini with M4 Source: Apple A Mac mini with M4 could offer significantly improved performance compared to the M2 model. With the M4 chip, Apple would have the opportunity to introduce new features and functionalities that were not possible with the M2 chip, thanks to its 10 cores and an improved GPU. This would allow users to enjoy a smoother and more efficient overall experience.
conclusion: ## When is a Mac mini with M4 Expected? The last Mac mini update was in January 2022, so it is expected that Apple will release an update to the Mac mini with M4 very soon. While there is no official release date yet, rumors suggest that Apple could announce the new Mac mini with M4 in late 2024.

title: Meta AI on WhatsApp: A Digital Assistant
image_alt: Image of WhatsApp with Meta AI
summary: Discover how Meta AI integrates into WhatsApp to offer a versatile and friendly digital assistant. Learn about its areas of expertise and the allowed conversation topics.
content:
Since its launch, the Meta AI artificial intelligence chatbot, marked with a blue circle in WhatsApp, has captured the attention of numerous users. The chatbot integrates into users' contact lists, who use it for various purposes. From casual interactions, similar to those you would have with a friend, to assistance with academic work, especially useful for students.
## Meta AI Areas of Expertise Meta AI stands out for its ability to offer reading recommendations, analysis, and book reviews, which is valuable for reading enthusiasts and book clubs. In the educational field, it provides learning strategies and technological resources for students and educators. In addition, the chatbot provides advice on buying mobile phones and using artificial intelligence. It also covers current affairs, including political, environmental, sports news, and much, much more.
## ‚úÖ Allowed Conversation Topics Meta AI can participate in discussions on a wide variety of topics, including: - **Science:** biology, physics, chemistry, space, etc. - **Art and culture:** music, movies, literature, history, etc. - **Health and wellness:** nutrition, exercise, mindfulness, etc. - **Travel and adventure:** destinations, experiences, tips, etc. - **Cooking and gastronomy:** recipes, techniques, restaurants, etc. - **Sports and fitness:** training, equipment, events, etc. - **Philosophy and psychology:** thoughts, theories, self-help, etc. Meta AI ensures that there are no limits on conversation topics and is willing to listen and provide information in any area of interest.
## üö´ Restricted Topics by Meta AI The chatbot has restrictions designed to maintain a safe and respectful environment. Prohibited topics include: - **Explicit or inappropriate content:** avoids conversations about sexual, offensive, or rude material. - **Incitement to violence and discrimination:** blocks racist, homophobic, xenophobic, and any hate speech messages. - **Disclosure of personal information:** protects sensitive data such as addresses and phone numbers.

## Medical and Legal Advice Source: Pexels Meta AI is not trained to perform medical diagnoses or offer legal advice. While it can provide general information, it is not a substitute for consulting professionals in these areas. In addition, it avoids discussions about illegal or harmful activities, such as drugs or computer piracy, redirecting conversations towards positive and constructive topics.
conclusion: ## Conclusion The Meta AI chatbot on WhatsApp presents itself as a versatile and friendly digital assistant, capable of interacting in multiple areas of interest. Its ability to offer recommendations, advice, and entertainment makes it a valuable tool for users of all ages. However, it is important to remember that, as it is an artificial intelligence, its responses may be limited in certain contexts, so it is recommended to complement its use with additional sources of information.

title: Best Gaming PC Under $500 USD
summary: Discover how to build a budget gaming PC for under $500 USD. Learn about the necessary components and recommendations to enjoy your favorite games.
content:
Today we're going to look at a budget gaming PC that you can build for under $500 USD. This budget is ideal for those who want to get started in the world of gaming without spending a fortune. While it's not a high-end machine, it's capable of running most current games with decent to good graphics quality. Plus, this PC has an advantage that we'll see later.
## (Case) Corsair 4000D Airflow ATX Case ![Corsair 4000D](https://res.cloudinary.com/dis6nw4o7/image/upload/v1722400678/40c8f07e-407e-423f-abe1-ced4c8d19e6e.png) The Corsair 4000D is a high-quality PC case designed to offer excellent airflow and a robust build. It features a solid steel front panel with wide ventilation channels, ensuring efficient cooling. **Note:** The case includes two pre-installed 120mm fans, but you can add more fans or a liquid cooling system to further improve your PC's cooling.
## (Motherboard) GIGABYTE B550M DS3H ![GIGABYTE B550M DS3H](https://res.cloudinary.com/dis6nw4o7/image/upload/v1722281805/0ac90f2d-ef44-4f6a-b898-68e0f155d742.png) The GIGABYTE B550M DS3H motherboard is an excellent choice for building a powerful and versatile PC. It's designed to work with 3rd Generation AMD Ryzen processors and offers stable and efficient power delivery thanks to its digital VRM system. Enjoy high data transfer speeds with PCIe 4.0 slots. **Note:** This motherboard is compatible with 5th Generation Ryzen processors, so you can upgrade your processor in the future.
## (Processor) AMD Ryzen 5 5600G ![AMD Ryzen 5 5600G](https://res.cloudinary.com/dis6nw4o7/image/upload/v1722281861/dd7753d8-159d-486e-a89a-f7902c254199.png) The Ryzen 5 5600G is a high-performance processor designed to deliver a smooth gaming and content creation experience. It combines a powerful 6-core CPU with integrated Radeon graphics, making it an excellent choice for those looking to build a versatile PC without the need for a dedicated graphics card. **Note:** This processor is compatible with the motherboard we chose, so you won't have compatibility issues.
## (RAM) XPG SPECTRIX D50 DDR4 RGB ![XPG SPECTRIX D50](https://res.cloudinary.com/dis6nw4o7/image/upload/v1722282035/c49fdda7-5bdb-4029-bee8-0b3d2faad91e.png) Reaching speeds of up to 4133 MHz and with a maximum capacity of 32 GB, the XPG SPECTRIX D50 module is an excellent memory option. It also boasts a stylish design and an impressive triangular RGB light bar. **Note:** With 16 GB of RAM, you'll have enough memory for most games and daily tasks. If you need more, you can buy two 16 GB modules for a total of 32 GB, although this would involve an additional expense.
## (Storage) Kingston M.2, Capacity: 1000 GB ![Kingston M.2](https://res.cloudinary.com/dis6nw4o7/image/upload/v1722281964/2e882e47-a6a5-4c1e-a83e-7d615244cfde.png) This Kingston NVMe Gen 4x4 SSD is perfect for compact computers like laptops and small form factor PCs. Thanks to its single-sided slim design, it fits easily into tight spaces. With ultra-fast read and write speeds, you'll be able to load applications and files in the blink of an eye. **Note:** We could have saved more with only 500 GB or by choosing a solid-state SSD, but this memory offers higher speed and capacity for a minimal price difference.
## (Power Supply) EVGA N1, 550W ![EVGA N1, 550W](https://res.cloudinary.com/dis6nw4o7/image/upload/v1722282085/c4af53f8-be74-4564-b7a8-2c5ce8d15e27.png) The EVGA 550W power supply features a 120mm fan that utilizes a sleeve bearing. This design, combined with an intelligent control system, allows for near-silent operation. It also incorporates multiple electronic protections such as OVP, UVP, OCP, OPP, and SCP to ensure the safety of your equipment and prevent damage. **Note:** Many people think this is the least important component, but a poor choice of power supply can ruin your entire PC. With this power supply, you won't have any problems.
conclusion:
## Total: $491.4 USD (Approximate Price - May Vary) ![Total PC](https://res.cloudinary.com/dis6nw4o7/image/upload/v1722282205/da095e3e-fedb-42a9-a60f-c48213175655.png)
## Add a Graphics Card in the Future ### For 1080p gaming with high details - **NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060:** Offers an excellent balance between price and performance, allowing you to play most current titles with high details and high refresh rates. - **AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT:** Another excellent option with similar performance to the RTX 3060, but with a slightly lower price. ### For 1440p or 4K gaming - **NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070:** Ideal for those looking to play at higher resolutions and with ultra details. - **AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT:** A solid alternative to the RTX 3070, offering similar performance in many games. ### For a tight budget - **NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050:** A more affordable option for those looking to improve their system's performance without spending too much. - **AMD Radeon RX 6600:** Similar to the RTX 3050, but with a different focus on certain technologies.

title: CMF: The NEW 'Budget' Sub-Brand from Nothing?
summary: Nothing and CMF, the new sub-brand focused on more affordable products. The catalog includes the CMF PHONE 1 and the BUDS PRO, offering quality and innovation at accessible prices.
content:
Since its inception, the brand Nothing, created in October 2020 by Carl Pei, who as we know was co-founder of OnePlus, has had a very clear focus on the quality of its products and innovation. It is extremely interesting to see how the brand has evolved and how it has grown in such a short time, and in just 4 years they have carved out a small niche in the smartphone and wearables market. This is thanks to its great and innovative design with an industrial touch and a build quality that leaves no one indifferent. Coupled with that, its product catalog has a cost that is not at all expensive; in fact, some have said that their brand is the 'Apple of the poor'. But now the brand has decided to go a step further with the sub-brand called CMF.
## What is CMF?

Source: CMF

 CMF is the sub-brand of Nothing and focuses on more affordable products, but without losing the quality and innovation that characterizes Nothing. This in itself is already a surprise since the brand has been characterized by having quality products at an affordable price, but now with CMF the products will be even more accessible.
## What products does CMF have? At the moment CMF has a somewhat small catalog but its most interesting products are: - **CMF PHONE 1**: A smartphone with a design inspired by the Nothing Phone 1 but with a more accessible price and with more striking colors, departing from the classic black and white colors of Nothing. Source: cmf - **BUDS PRO**: Headphones with a very good design and visibly good build quality. Source: cmf - **BUDS PRO 2**: The next generation of BUDS PRO with improvements over the CMF PHONE 1, in addition to implementing LDAC technology. Source: cmf - **WATCH PRO**: A smartwatch with a rectangular design that is quite reminiscent of the Apple Watch. Source: cmf - **WATCH PRO 2**: The next generation of WATCH PRO with a circular design and the promise of being more resistant. Source: cmf
conclusion: ## Conclusion In short, we may be facing a great competitor against brands like Xiaomi or Realme, but adding the classic industrial design touch of the Nothing brand.

title: How to Improve Visual Studio Code Performance
summary: Learn how to improve Visual Studio Code performance with these tips and tricks. Learn how to disable unnecessary extensions, optimizations, and more.
content: ## 1. Disable unnecessary extensions Source: Luna News It is very common for some Visual Studio Code extensions to consume many system resources, which can slow down the editor's performance. To improve the performance of Visual Studio Code, it is advisable to disable extensions that are not frequently used or that are not essential for the workflow. To disable an extension, follow these steps: 1. Open Visual Studio Code. 2. Click on the "Extensions" tab in the left sidebar. 3. Search for the extension you want to disable. 4. Click the gear button next to the extension and select "Disable". ## 2. Update extensions and adjust the configuration Source: Luna News Visual Studio Code extensions are one of the reasons why it is so popular, but sometimes they can be the cause of the editor becoming slow. To improve the performance of Visual Studio Code, it is important to keep extensions updated and adjust the configuration as needed. This is because some Visual Studio Code errors can be caused by outdated extensions or incorrect configurations. To update Visual Studio Code extensions, follow these steps: 1. Open Visual Studio Code. 2. Click on the "Extensions" tab in the left sidebar. 3. Click the update button at the top of the extensions list. 4. (Optional) You can select Auto-Update so that extensions are automatically updated. ## 3. Clean the Visual Studio Code cache Source: Luna News Visual Studio Code caches files and data to improve editor performance. However, sometimes the cache can grow too large and slow down the performance of Visual Studio Code. To clean the Visual Studio Code cache, follow these steps: * **Locate the VS Code user data folder:** The location of this folder varies depending on your operating system: * **Windows:** `%APPDATA%\Code\User\` or `%USERPROFILE%\.vscode\` * **macOS:** `$HOME/Library/Application Support/Code/User/` * **Linux:** `$HOME/.config/Code/User/` * **Within the "User" folder, search for and delete the following folders:** * `Cache` * `CachedData` * `Code Cache` (optional, this folder stores the cache of the VS Code main process) ## 4. Switch to a light theme Source: Pexels One of the lesser-known reasons why Visual Studio Code might have poor performance is the theme you are using. Dark themes are popular among developers, but they can consume more system resources than light themes. To change the Visual Studio Code theme, follow these steps: 1. Open Visual Studio Code. 2. Enter `Ctrl + Shift + P` to open the command palette or `Cmd + Shift + P` on macOS. 3. Type "Preferences: Color Theme" and select the desired option (preferably the ones that come by default). ## 5. Consider changing the SSD of your computer Source: Luna News If your computer has a mechanical hard drive (HDD) instead of a solid-state drive (SSD), consider upgrading to an SSD to improve the overall performance of Visual Studio Code and your system in general. SSDs are considerably faster than HDDs and can significantly accelerate the speed of file loading and overall system responsiveness.
conclusion: ## Conclusion By following these tips and tricks, you can significantly improve the performance of Visual Studio Code and optimize your development workflow. Remember to keep your extensions updated, clear the cache regularly, and consider upgrading to an SSD for a significant performance boost.

title: Lubuntu: The Lightweight Operating System for Old Computers
summary: What is Lubuntu and how can it help you revive your old computer? Discover its features, advantages and disadvantages, and whether it is right for you.
content:
Lubuntu is a variant of Ubuntu designed to offer efficient performance on computers with older or less powerful hardware. Its name, a combination of ‚Äúlightweight‚Äù and Ubuntu,‚Äù reflects its goal: to provide a lightweight but functional operating system. It uses the LXQt desktop environment to minimize hardware requirements while maintaining a modern and clean look.
## History and Evolution Lubuntu began in 2009 as a community project led by Mario Behling, who sought to develop a minimalist version of Ubuntu. The first version was released as a live CD in September 2009, and the full installation was made available the following year. Since then, Lubuntu has become an official option within the Ubuntu family, with versions released every six months and the LTS (Long-Term Support) version starting in 2013.
## System Requirements One of the biggest attractions of Lubuntu is its low resource consumption. The minimum requirements include a 700 MHz processor, 512 MB of RAM, and 5 GB of storage. As of version 19.04, Lubuntu no longer supports 32-bit systems, focusing on more modern hardware to offer a better experience.
## Programs and Applications Lubuntu comes with a selection of pre-installed programs suitable for everyday tasks, including Featherpad for text editing, LibreOffice Writer and Calc for office work, and Mozilla Firefox as a web browser. It also has the VLC player and the NetworkManager network manager. Users can install a wide range of additional applications as needed.

## Distinctive Features Lubuntu differs from Ubuntu mainly in its user environment and hardware requirements. LXQt provides a clear and minimalist interface that saves resources and ensures smooth performance even on older computers. This approach allows new users to adapt quickly, although the system omits some advanced graphic effects.
## Advantages and Disadvantages ### Advantages - **Low Hardware Requirements**: Ideal for old or less powerful computers, Lubuntu offers efficient performance with minimal resource consumption. - **Free and Ad-Free**: No associated costs and no intrusive ads. - **Abundant Software**: Compatible with numerous free and accessible applications. - **Ease of Use**: The LXQt interface is intuitive and accessible, with support in multiple languages. - **Support and Community**: Regular updates and an active user community.
### Disadvantages - **Software Limitations**: Some larger applications may not work properly, and Windows applications may require additional tools. - **Visual Appearance**: The minimalist design may lack some graphic effects and advanced functionalities. - **Initial Configuration**: May require additional knowledge for users coming from other operating systems such as Windows or macOS.
## Who is Lubuntu Recommended for? Source: Lubuntu Lubuntu is especially suitable for users who need to revitalize old or limited hardware. With its focus on efficiency and its modern desktop environment, it can be a viable option even for newer computers. However, if running heavy applications or looking for an advanced graphical experience is a priority, other Linux distributions may be more appropriate. Lubuntu 20.04: Lightweight and Efficiency in Action
## Description and Features Lubuntu 20.04 stands out for its lightness and its LXQt desktop environment, which minimizes system resource consumption. This operating system is ideal for rejuvenating old computers, allowing them to function as multimedia centers or backup machines. With a 5.4 kernel, Lubuntu 20.04 stays in line with the rest of the distributions of its version.
## Management and Configuration Lubuntu's window manager is agile and reliable, although system customization, such as changing the wallpaper, can be less intuitive for new users. The lack of an integrated software center is another point to consider, although the Snap Store or other software centers can be installed.
conclusion: ## Recommendations Lubuntu 20.04 is ideal for users with Linux experience who are looking to optimize old hardware. The distribution offers a solid experience, but it may not be the most beginner-friendly option due to the need for additional knowledge for configuration. The recommendation is to try it if you have experience with Linux and want to revive an old computer.

title: The New Chinese Processors That Threaten Intel and AMD
image_alt: Image of the new Chinese processors
summary: The new Loongson processors represent a threat to Intel and AMD. Discover their features and how they could change the landscape of the semiconductor industry.
content:
The new Loongson processors represent the Asian giant's response to the belief that China cannot develop its own processors. In July 2024, the new Loongson LS3C6000 processor was introduced, designed primarily for servers, but also suitable for desktop computers. This launch is a harbinger of what could happen in the not-too-distant future.
## Most Outstanding Features This processor has very interesting features that are comparable to those of Intel or AMD processors. Some of its most outstanding features are: * **Frequency:** 2.0-2.5GHz * **Maximum Calculation Speed:** 240 GFLOPS * **Physical Cores:** 4 * **Logical Cores:** 8 * **High-Speed Cache:** The processor has a private cache for each core and a shared cache of 16MB. * **Packaging:** Comes in a 35mm√ó35mm BGA package with 1,190 pins. * **Power Management:** Supports dynamic voltage scaling in the main voltage domains. * **Typical Power Consumption:** 38W
## What can be done with this processor? Source: Loongson Due to its outstanding features, this processor can be used in various areas such as: * **Servers:** Ideal for servers due to its large number of cores and its maximum calculation speed of 240 GFLOPS. * **Workstations:** With a frequency of 2.0-2.5GHz and 8 logical cores, it is suitable for workstations. * **Desktop Computers:** Sufficient to meet the needs of an average user. * **Data Centers:** Perfect for data centers thanks to its calculation speed and numerous cores. * **Gaming:** Although not its main focus, it can be used for gaming due to its 8 logical cores and its frequency.

## Are these new processors a threat to Intel and AMD? While this processor is not as powerful as the top-of-the-line processors from Intel or AMD, it does represent a threat to these two giants. The Loongson 3A6000 presents a significant performance improvement compared to the Loongson 3A5000, with an increase of 60% and 90%. If this evolution continues, it could become a major competitor to Intel and AMD in the not-too-distant future.
## What would be the position of the United States and the West? Although this processor does not currently represent a major threat to the industry, it is an example of what China can achieve in the future. The United States and the West must be prepared for what may happen. The possibility of this processor being sold en masse in the West is complicated due to the trade war between China and the United States, and the situation in Taiwan. In 2024, China injected more than $47 billion into an investment fund to strengthen its semiconductor research and development industry, indicating its strong commitment to this sector.
conclusion: ## Conclusion The new Loongson processors represent a significant advance in the semiconductor industry and a demonstration of China's potential in this field. Although they do not currently represent a major threat to Intel and AMD, they are a harbinger of what could happen in the not-too-distant future. The United States and the West must be prepared for what may happen and not underestimate China's potential in this sector.

title: Nvidia: From Graphics Cards to Leader in Artificial Intelligence
summary: By leveraging gaming, crypto, and AI, Nvidia has transformed into an AI powerhouse, surpassing even Tesla and Meta.
content: How has Nvidia become one of the most valuable companies in the world, surpassing giants like Tesla or Meta? It's quite interesting to see how Nvidia has evolved from a graphics card company to surpass tech giants. To understand this, let's delve into the factors that have propelled Nvidia to become one of the most valuable companies in the world. ## 1. Nvidia and the Growth of the Video Game World Source: Luna News The video game world has experienced exponential growth in recent years, and Nvidia has capitalized on this trend. Since the early days of modern gaming, it's been known that conventional processors weren't enough to run games optimally. Companies like Nvidia seized the opportunity presented by these new processors known as GPUs, and since then, Nvidia has been a leading player in the graphics card market. ## 2. The Cryptocurrency Mining Fever Source: Luna News Cryptocurrency mining initially relied on conventional processors, but it was discovered that graphics cards were far more efficient for this task due to the parallel processing capabilities of GPUs. Between 2017 and 2021, there was a cryptocurrency mining frenzy. During that time, obtaining a graphics card was nearly impossible, and waitlists for some models stretched for months. This surge in demand led to skyrocketing graphics card prices. Graphics card companies benefited greatly, especially Nvidia. However, the event that would truly catapult Nvidia's stock and establish it as one of the world's most valuable companies was yet to come. ## 3. The Artificial Intelligence Boom Source: Luna News It's no secret that artificial intelligence is here to stay, and contrary to popular belief, it's not a new concept but rather one with decades of development behind it. However, once again, conventional processors proved insufficient for running artificial intelligence algorithms optimally. Processes like neural network training or embedding require massive computational power. This is where Nvidia enters the scene once more with its GPUs. As we know, these are much more efficient at parallel processing, making them ideal for artificial intelligence tasks. Nvidia has seized the opportunity presented by the AI boom and capitalized on it effectively, even shifting its market strategy to focus more on artificial intelligence. They've gone so far as to rebrand themselves from a graphics card company to an artificial intelligence company.
conclusion: ## Final Conclusion Nvidia has expertly capitalized on market opportunities, effectively leveraging them in the realms of video games, cryptocurrency mining, and especially artificial intelligence.

title: What is SearchGPT and How Does It Work?
summary: SearchGPT, the new search engine from OpenAI, uses GPT-4 to deliver more accurate and relevant results. Join the waitlist to try it out.
content: OpenAI, the founding company of ChatGPT, DALLE, and other artificial intelligence tools used by millions of users today, announced on July 25, 2024, its new product that promises to revolutionize the world of internet search. SearchGPT is an AI-powered search engine that uses OpenAI's GPT-4 model to provide more accurate and relevant search results. This search engine uses the power of artificial intelligence to better understand user queries and deliver more relevant results in less time. ## How SearchGPT Works and its Features Key features of SearchGPT: ![Characteristics](https://res.cloudinary.com/dis6nw4o7/image/upload/v1722102759/imagen_2_roqspb.jpg) * **Fast and direct answers**: Provides up-to-date information from the web with clear links to relevant sources. * **Continuous conversation**: Allows follow-up questions to be asked, building a shared context with each query. * **Collaboration with publishers and creators**: Promotes the discovery of publisher sites, highlighting high-quality content in a conversational interface. * **Clear attribution**: Responses have clear attribution and links so users know where the information comes from. * **Continuous improvements**: They plan to improve the experience in areas such as local information and commerce. * **Integration with ChatGPT**: User and publisher feedback will help integrate the best features of SearchGPT into ChatGPT. ## How can I use SearchGPT? ![SearchGPT waitlist](https://res.cloudinary.com/dis6nw4o7/image/upload/v1722102886/9b47cb0a-09ad-4fbc-bf21-d30ec83436d4.png) Although SearchGPT is not yet available to the general public, you can join the waiting list to be notified when it becomes available and gain access to this new AI-powered search tool.
conclusion: ## Conclusion SearchGPT is an AI-powered search engine that promises to revolutionize the way we search for information on the internet. With its ability to better understand user queries and provide more accurate and relevant results. While it is not yet available to the general public, it is a tool to keep in mind for the future of online search.

title: Thunderbolt K78 Keyboard Review
summary: Discover the pros and cons of the Thunderbolt K78 keyboard after continuous use. Learn about its features, what's included in the box, and our conclusion.
content:
The Thunderbolt K78 keyboard is a mechanical keyboard that is a more affordable alternative to high-end mechanical keyboards, however this does not mean that it is a bad keyboard. In fact, it is a quite acceptable keyboard for the price, and now we are going to tell you the pros and cons of this keyboard after two months of continuous use.
## Features - **Language:** Spanish Latin America - **Layout:** QWERTY - **Switches:** Outemu Red or Brown. - **Backlighting:** RGB - **Keyboard Color:** White/Black - **Ergonomic and suitable for various uses.** - **Contains numeric keypad.** - **Keyboard Type:** Mechanical. - **With USB-C connector.** - **With removable cable.** - **Dimensions:** 100.6cm wide, 347.6mm high, and 33.5cm deep.
## What's in the box - Thunderbolt K78 Keyboard - USB-C Cable - 2 additional Outemu Red or Brown switches - Keycap puller - User manual

## Pros - **Price:** The price of this keyboard is quite affordable compared to other mechanical keyboards, costing approximately $200 USD. - **Backlighting:** The RGB backlighting is pretty good, you can configure the intensity or the speed of the RGB. - **Switches:** The Outemu Red or Brown switches are quite good, the Red switches are linear and the Brown are tactile, both are quite good for typing and gaming (Personally we prefer the Brown due to their balance of silence and comfort). - **Removable Cable:** The USB-C cable is removable, which makes transporting the keyboard easier. - **PBT Keycaps:** The keyboard keys are made of PBT, which makes them more resistant to wear and discoloration. - **Design:** The keyboard design is quite good, being 78% the size of a full keyboard, making it quite compact and comfortable to carry anywhere. - **Ready to Use:** The keyboard is plug and play, you don't need to install any drivers to use it.
## Cons - **Build Quality:** The build quality of the keyboard is quite good, however it is made entirely of plastic. - **Software:** You can only modify the keyboard backlighting with its predefined configurations, you cannot customize the backlighting to your liking. - **Noise:** The Red and even Brown switches are quite noisy, if you are looking for a silent keyboard this is not the keyboard for you. - **No Wrist Rest:** The keyboard does not have a wrist rest, which can be uncomfortable for some people. - **Limitation of Some Keys:** If you use all the function keys on the keyboard or some others like Home, End, or Delete, you will have to use Fn to access them.
conclusion: ## Conclusion The Thunderbolt K78 keyboard is a pretty good keyboard for its price. If you're looking for an affordable and good quality mechanical keyboard, this is the keyboard for you. However, if you're looking for a silent keyboard or one with a more premium design, we recommend opting for a slightly higher-end option.
